citation_title: Generosity Across the Income and Wealth Distributions
topics:
Microeconomics

Market Structure and Distribution

Welfare and Collective Choice

Public Economics

Public Goods
abstract: Despite widespread interest, there is little systematic evidence on the relationship between income, wealth, and charitable giving. We use the Panel Study of Income Dynamics to provide descriptive statistics on this relationship. We find that, irrespective of specifica­tion, donative behavior increases with greater resources.
